about_the_game:
Welcome to Tipsy Trot! In this thrilling 3D arcade runner game, you step into the shoes of a determined character with a challenging mission: to run forward and deliver bottles without stumbling. The road ahead is filled with obstacles that will test your reflexes, agility, and concentration. The further you go, the harder it gets, making every step a test of your endurance. With each passing meter, the pressure mounts – can you walk more than a kilometer and complete your delivery? It’s time to find out in this fast-paced, addictive challenge that demands precision and skill!

Game Features:
Fast-paced gameplay demanding reflexes and agility
Unique gameplay where every step counts towards reaching your goal
Increasing difficulty

name: Tipsy Trot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tipsy Trot is a fast-paced 3D arcade runner game with unique gameplay. Run forward and deliver bottles, overcoming challenging tests that require dexterity and concentration. Can you run more than a kilometer?
